玩久了慢慢懂溜屠夫了，赢了要说“good killer”鼓励下杀手，输了要说“gg killer” 让杀手自豪，这样才能可持续发展

After playing for a long time, I've learned to fight the killer. If I win, I have to say "good killer" to encourage the killer, and if I lose, I have to say "GG killer" to make the killer proud, so as to achieve sustainable development

Nicht sehr einsteigerfreundlich aber wenn man zusammen mit freunden spielt kann es viel spaß machen.
Wäre noch schön wenn man irgendwie die helligkeit und den kontrast ein wenig besser einstellen könnte, da ich manchmal fast gar nichts sehe wenn es dunkler ist und das schon etwas beim spielen behindert.

oyun kendine göre bir taktiksel derinliğe sahip oyundaki perkler ile çeşitli buildler ve çeşitli gameplayler ortaya çıkarabiliyorsunuz bu konuda asıl sıkıntı perklerin daha doğrusu karakterlerin (her karakter kendine özgü 3 perke sahip) dlc ile satılıyor olması yani oyun bir bakıma pay to win aynı mantık killerlar için de geçerli bunun yanı sıra oyunda çok fazla hile ve bug var diğer bir sıkıntı ise oyunu oynayan türk sayısı az olduğu için oyunun tr için bir servere sahip olmaması yani ortalama 70-90 ping aralığında oynayabiliyorsunuz ben severek oynasamda objektif olarak baktığımda oyunu önermiyorum.

Katili camp yapar survivoru katille takım olur. Replersin behaviour siklemez bununlada kalmaz camplemenin taktik olduğunu savunur. Eşleştirme sisteminden bahsetmiyorum bile  oyunda lig var hiçbir anlamı yok zaten her ayın 13ünde sıfırlanıyor sıfırlanmasa bile her turda max lig ile oyuna yeni başlayan birisi oluyor. ilk dkdan 1 kişi azalınca kazanma şansınızda olmuyor. Oyun bunlara rağmen oynanabilir ancak deli eder

Juego muy bueno, con buen dinamismo, lo único que lo arruina es la gente que campea, ¿que hay de divertido en eso?, en fin, bueno para pasar el rato con tus amigos :D

Alright I'll be honest about this game because I really like it but there are so many problems that I can't even enjoy the game anymore. So let's go back to 2016 when this game was released and I just randomly happened to find out about this game. At the time as I didn't have a credit card and I decided to torrent it to see what it was like and my God did I shit my pants. I still remember those matches because none of us had any fucking clue what we were doing and the game was unbalanced. I remember when Trapper could put his trap in front of the hooked survivor and the only way to get rid of traps was to sabotage them. It was 2016 Dead by Daylight and it was fun. 2020 comes around and I randomly found out about this game again and thought it was fun. I decided to buy it this time around and I'm glad I did because during that time it was really fun for me. The game was more balanced and had more killers so there was more replayability. Hours went by and I reached 200 hours in like 3 months just because it was that fun to me. But it went all downhill the moment when the company started to add more and more killers and instead of focusing on the problems like bugs and a grindy system to unlock perks and recently they decided to ramp it up to 11. Remember Mettle of Man and the fuck fest that was? I do, it was singlehandedly one of the worst times for killers because literally every single survivor used the perk and ran 3 other meta perks. Now I'd like to present the first problem of DBD: the problem of overchoice. There are in total 26 killers and 29 survivors who each have 3 perks. Do you see the problem? There are many perks which function relatively the same because the devs are running out of ideas on what to make and usually perks are commonly weak. The devs should honestly stop adding new killers and survivors because if you almost have 60 playable character then something isn't alright. The devs should be fixing the game because since the release it's been a buggy mess ranging from small bugs to bugs that allow players to get out of bounds. The second problem are the bugs and the cheaters. If you don't know the game's been infested by cheaters for some time now and it's really pathetic how in every high ranking gsme there are cheaters now. The game has an anti cheat and people have been cheating since 2016 without getting banned. While some cheaters do get banned it isn't showing a example to them. Please have a better anti cheat so that people can enjoy the game. The bugs, oh man the bugs. I don't know how is this possible but with every fix there are 10 more bugs that need to be fixed. I know that bugs are present in every game and that it takes time to fix them but if you have an active developer team that fucks up the game with every bug fix then you need either a better team or a better engine. Third and last complain is the grind. The grind is ludicrous and it needs to be removed like one million bloodpoints won't even get you to tier 3 level 50 which is fine but the fact is that every single perk has three levels, three levels which is in total 165 just by the killer and survivor perks and not the included all killer all survivor perks. The system worked before because there were only 3 killers and 4 survivors which really wasn't a bad idea but now it's just really awful. If you have a favourite killer it'll take a long time for you just to get them all of the perks. And that's my review of DBD while I love the game there are some big flaws that make it just really hard to come back to and I wish I could but I just can't. Also I won't talk about the balance team and the community. Both got worse over time and ai don't want to write a book here.

О моих ощущениях...Игра затягивает, как наркотик.
Каждый раз когда моего персонажа приносят в жертву, я в сердце кричу, ощущение того что тебя поймали или могут поймать, когда за тобой гонится этот ужасающий маньяк будоражит.
Игра отличная - видно на сколько создатели любят свое творение. Не скажу что идеальная, такого не существует на мой взгляд. Игра постоянно обновляется, все баги пытаются сразу же убрать,в общем, все сделано для того, что бы игрок чувствовал себя уютно.
Но иногда удручает стабильность в действиях, иной раз приходиться брать перерыв в виде пары дней, а у кого-то иногда и месяцев.
Ужасный подбор игроков по рангам. Ты можешь быть новичком, но попасть к бывалому игроку(как маньяк,  так и выживший).
Игра на ваш вкус и цвет как говорится, кому-то зайдёт кому-то нет.
